name: Motorball
description:
Start your engines and drive to your favorite arena in this real-time, fast paced multiplayer game from the creators of Golf Blitz!

Head to the garage to unlock dozens of unique cars, paint jobs, accessories and more to customize your ride and score goals in style. 

Do you have what it takes to win your match and climb to the top of the leaderboards? Earn medals and upgrade your stats to become an elite goal scoring machine.

Watch live matches from all over the world on Motorball TV or get in on the action with your favorite power ups. 

Features:

- Duel against players in 1v1 battles from all over the world.
- Unlock new cosmetics for your car to level up your ride.
- Increase your Speed, Boost, Acceleration and Control stats to find a play style that fits you best.
- Express yourself with hilarious emotes during and between matches. 
- Unlock tons of cars, paint jobs, decals, boost trails and more. Thousands of combinations await!
